segments.text: The towel's wrapped around the plate, her hands moving methodically.

segments.text: To her left, the boy's on the stool, arm deep in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks so unstable, legs all splayed out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If it tips, he'll come crashing down with cookies everywhere.

segments.text: His sister's right there, palm up, expectant and excited.

segments.text: It's sad that such a normal day could turn chaotic so fast.
